description.value:
You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

Make a melee Strike against an opponent that isn't hiding its scent with an effect like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Negate Aroma]{Negate Aroma}. This attack ignores any flat check required due to the target being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden}.

value.value: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
